Observed at: Jasper Warden Station 10:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
Temperature: 6.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: 2.5°C
Wind: SE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. A few rain showers or flurries beginning this evening then changing to a few flurries after midnight. Snow level 2300 metres lowering to valley bottom this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this evening then light overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
